trans-unit.source: Represents a single data point collected from the digitizer and stylus.
trans-unit.target: Representa um único ponto de dados coletado do digitalizador e da caneta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> collects data when a user inputs ink using the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> coleta de dados quando um usuário insere tinta usando o digitalizador.

trans-unit.source: Because the information that a digitizer reports differs depending on the manufacturer, the properties within a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> can vary.
trans-unit.target: Como as informações que informa um digitalizador é diferente dependendo do fabricante, as propriedades dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> pode variar.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a property is in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se uma propriedade é no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A> property contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that specifies which properties are in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A> propriedade contém um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> que especifica as propriedades que estão na <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects contain properties that specify the (x, y) coordinates, as well as the pressure.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objetos contêm propriedades que especificam (x, y) coordenadas, bem como a pressão.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets property names and values for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém os nomes e valores para cada <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> chamado `packetOutput`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class using specified (x, y) coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> usando as coordenadas especificadas (x, y).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de pressão aplicada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class using specified (x, y) coordinates and pressure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> usando as coordenadas (x, y) e a pressão especificadas.

trans-unit.source: `pressureFactor` must have a value between 0 and 1, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: `pressureFactor` deve ter um valor entre 0 e 1, inclusive.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 0 indica que nenhuma pressão é aplicada, enquanto um valor de 1 indica que a quantidade máxima de pressão é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 0,5 indica que 50% de pressão de máximo é aplicado e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pressureFactor" /> is less than 0 or greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pressureFactor" /> é menor que 0 ou maior que 1.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de pressão aplicada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the additional properties stored in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> que especifica as propriedades adicionais armazenadas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of 32-bit signed integers that contains the values of the properties defined in <c>stylusPointDescription</c>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de inteiros com sinal de 32 bits que contém os valores das propriedades definidas em <c>stylusPointDescription</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> class using specified (x, y) coordinates, a <paramref name="pressureFactor" />, and additional parameters specified in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> usando as coordenadas especificadas (x, y), um <paramref name="pressureFactor" /> e parâmetros adicionais especificados na <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pressureFactor" /> is less than 0 or greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pressureFactor" /> é menor que 0 ou maior que 1.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The values in <paramref name="additionalValues" /> that correspond to button properties are not 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: Os valores em <paramref name="additionalValues" /> que correspondem às propriedades do botão não são 0 nem 1.

trans-unit.source: The number of values in <paramref name="additionalValues" /> does not match the number of properties in <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> minus 3.
trans-unit.target: O número de valores em <paramref name="additionalValues" /> não corresponde ao número de propriedades em <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> menos 3.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the properties stored in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> que especifica as propriedades armazenadas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specifies the properties stored in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> Especifica as propriedades armazenadas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A> property to get property values from <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description%2A> valores de propriedade para obter a propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> chamado `packetOutput`.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified object is equal to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o objeto especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir verifica dois <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objetos para igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> propriedades `point1` e `point2` são definidos para o mesmo valor, o "os dois objetos StylusPoint são iguais."

trans-unit.source: Message appears.
trans-unit.target: Será exibida a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor booliano que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> forem iguais, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir verifica dois <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objetos para igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> propriedades `point1` e `point2` são definidos para o mesmo valor, o "os dois objetos StylusPoint são iguais."

trans-unit.source: Message appears.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor booliano que indica se os dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> especificados são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> forem iguais, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir verifica dois <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objetos para igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> propriedades `point1` e `point2` são definidos para o mesmo valor, o "os dois objetos StylusPoint são iguais."

trans-unit.source: Message appears.
trans-unit.target: Será exibida a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro com sinal de 32 bits que é o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> that specifies which property value to get.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> que especifica qual valor da propriedade deve ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor da propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contains the specified property, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> before calling either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contém a propriedade especificada, a chamada a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> antes de chamar qualquer uma de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks for the existence of a stylus point property before getting the property's value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir verifica a existência de uma propriedade de ponto de caneta antes de obter o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> called `point`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> chamado `point`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPointProperty" /> is not one of the properties in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylusPointProperty" /> não é uma das propriedades na <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> to check for in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> a ser verificada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> contains the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> atual contém a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> is in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> especificada estiver no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> atual, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contains the specified property, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> before calling either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contém a propriedade especificada, a chamada a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> antes de chamar qualquer uma de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks for the existence of a stylus point property before getting the property's value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir verifica a existência de uma propriedade de ponto de caneta antes de obter o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> called `point`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> chamado `point`.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the largest valid value for a pair of (x, y) coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o maior valor válido para um par de coordenadas (x, y).

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir garante que o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> é definido como um valor válido.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest valid value for a pair of (x, y) coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o menor valor válido para um par de coordenadas (x, y).

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir garante que o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> é definido como um valor válido.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Compares two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects and determines whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> especificados e determina se eles são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> forem iguais, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Equals%28System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint%2CSystem.Windows.Input.StylusPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Equals%28System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint%2CSystem.Windows.Input.StylusPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example checks two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir verifica dois <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objetos para igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> propriedades `point1` e `point2` são definidos para o mesmo valor, o "os dois objetos StylusPoint são iguais."

trans-unit.source: Message appears.
trans-unit.target: Será exibida a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser convertido em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Casts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that contains the same (x,y) coordinates as <paramref name="stylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> que contém as mesmas coordenadas (x, y) que <paramref name="stylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to cast a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> to a <xref:System.Windows.Point> object to draw a circle at the beginning of every stroke.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como converter uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> para um <xref:System.Windows.Point> objeto ao desenhar um círculo no início de cada traço.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> object called `inkcanvas1` and that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> event is connected to the event handler in the example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> objeto chamado `inkcanvas1` e que o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> evento está conectado ao manipulador de eventos no exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value which indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor booliano que indica se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> especificados são diferentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos especificados <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> forem diferentes, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Equals%2A>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é a negação de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to check two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como verificar dois <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objetos desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> properties on `point1` and `point2` are set to the same value, the "The two StylusPoint objects are equal."
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> propriedades `point1` e `point2` são definidos para o mesmo valor, o "os dois objetos StylusPoint são iguais."

trans-unit.source: Message appears.
trans-unit.target: Será exibida a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value between 0 and 1 that reflects the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor entre 0 e 1 que reflete a quantidade de pressão que a caneta aplica à superfície do digitalizador quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> é criado.

trans-unit.source: Value between 0 and 1 indicating the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface as the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Valor entre 0 e 1 que indica a quantidade de pressão a caneta se aplica a superfície do digitalizador como o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> é criado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> property is expressed as a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> propriedade é expressa como um valor entre 0 e 1.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 0 indica que nenhuma pressão é aplicada, enquanto um valor de 1 indica que a quantidade máxima de pressão é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 0,5 indica que 50% de pressão de máximo é aplicado e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> property to retrieve and display the pressure value for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> called `points`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor%2A> propriedade para recuperar e exibir o valor de pressão para cada <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> em uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> chamado `points`.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> chamado `packetOutput`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor" /> property is set to a value less than 0 or greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.PressureFactor" /> é definida como um valor menor que 0 ou maior que 1.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> that specifies which property value to set.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> que especifica qual valor da propriedade deve ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified property to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade especificada com o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contains the specified property, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> before calling either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> contém a propriedade especificada, a chamada a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.HasProperty%2A> antes de chamar qualquer uma de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.GetPropertyValue%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.SetPropertyValue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks for the existence of a stylus point property before setting the property's value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir verifica a existência de uma propriedade de ponto de caneta antes de definir o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> called `point`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> chamado `point`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPointProperty" /> is not one of the properties in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylusPointProperty" /> não é uma das propriedades na <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Description" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> em uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value for the x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da coordenada x do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.X%2A> propriedade para cada <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> chamado `packetOutput`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada y do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint.Y%2A> propriedade para cada <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> called `packetOutput`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> chamado `packetOutput`.
